5073.quoteText: 3.5.3. If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us.
5073.title: This service provides a way for you to export your data

tosdr.case: This service provides a way for you to export your data

5076.quoteText: 3.7.2. Medtinker does not  actively pursue  the use of cookies or other tracking software  in order to track the Personal Information of our Users. However certain third party services that we utilize may or may not use cookies in order to improve the technical functionality of the website.
5076.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

5077.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

5079.quoteText: You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you.
5079.title: You can delete your content from this service

tosdr.case: You can delete your content from this service

5082.quoteText:
Like many site operators, we collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our website (“Log Data”).

3.1.2. This Log Data may include information such as your computer’s Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, browser type, browser version, the pages of our Site that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages and other statistics.

3.1.3. If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.
5082.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
